pr_title: Fix a customer issue when SSL is enabled

timeline.message: Fix a customer issue when SSL is enabled

timeline.bodyText: The only reference to getServerClusterPortPropertyValue is from validateClusterServersListenPortProperty. But I cannot find validateClusterServersListenPortProperty being called from anywhere. If so this change in line 472 would not make any difference. I may be mistaken though.
timeline.author: alai8
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -469,7 +470,7 @@ def getServerClusterPortPropertyValue(self, server, clusterListenPortProperty):
       sslListenPort = ssl.getListenPort()
     sslListenPortEnabled = None
     if ssl is not None:
-      sslListenPortEnabled = ssl.isListenPortEnabled()
+      sslListenPortEnabled = ssl.isEnabled()
